subject: Lesson Report for Val (Tue Nov 14, 2023 at 06:30 PM)
body:
Val Lessons Report: Tue Nov 14, 2023 at 06:30 PM

The thing we worked on was Rapp Snitch Knishes by MF Doom (because Val had practiced it on his own).

We used this link for the chord progression:
Rapp Snitch Knishes Chord Progression

We talked about a chordal approach to melody. And reviewed major and minor arpeggios.

We didn't get to "You've got a Friend in Me" until the very end. Val is very close to being able to play that.

Ideas for the future:

Gehanna by Slipknot
Seek and Destroy by Metallica

Watermelon Man
Take 5


If any of this is incorrect, please contact us at:

  • Email: ggoadmusic@gmail.com
  • Phone: 336-406-1319
